mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between British officials regarding a wireless telephone set that was being used by the Ruler of Kuwait, Shaikh Ahmad al-Jaber al-Sabah, to address the public in Kuwait.The correspondence discusses the technical details involved in this process as well as what other transmitting sets were then in existence in Kuwait.
